item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 29, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:

19. Visualize and debug Rust programs with a new lens (186 points | 25 comments)
20. What If We Had Bigger Brains? Imagining Minds Beyond Ours (146 points | 171 comments)

22. Data Breach at LexisNexis Risk Solutions Impacts 364,000 (12 points | 1 comment)
23. What does “Undecidable” mean, anyway (114 points | 111 comments)
24. Compiling a neural net to C for a speedup (250 points | 82 comments)
25. Basic for the Raspberry Pi Pico and Pico 2 (63 points | 2 comments)

27. Nobel Laureate Daron Acemoglu: Don't Believe the AI Hype (34 points | 15 comments)
